Data Fields

ExtAddr_t srcAddress

Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-REQUEST-KEY.indication primitive.

See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.25, page 466.

Definition at line 129 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_RequestKeyInd_t::srcAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that sent the request-key command.

Definition at line 133 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

APS_RequestKeyType_t APS_RequestKeyInd_t::keyType

The type of key being requested. Valid values:

  • APS_NETWORK_KEY_TYPE
  • APS_APP_KEY_TYPE

Definition at line 138 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_RequestKeyInd_t::partnerAddress

[LE] If the KeyType parameter indicates an application key, this parameter shall indicate an extended 64-bit address of a device that shall receive the same key as the device requesting the key.

Definition at line 142 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.
